summary: CONSUMER WAS SOLD A VEHICLE FROM SALVAGE UNAWARE.  *MR  THE LICENSED DEALER TRIED TO SELL THE VEHICLE WITHOUT OWNERSHIP PAPERS.  (THE VEHICLE BELONGED TO THE CONSUMER) THE DEALER HAD TAKEN THE FEE FOR STORAGE AND NEVER RETURNED THE VEHICLE TO THE CONSUMER, THEN SOLD THE CONSUMER AN AUTO FROM THE SALVAGE WITHOUT A WRITTEN NOTICE TO THE CONSUMER OR DMV.  THE RACK AND PINION LEAKED.  (MODEL- GLS)  *SCC. ALSO THE MOTOR MOUNT WAS BROKE, AND THE CROSS MEMBER AND COVER SUPPORT WAS  BENT    *JB
